activities: Malikco receives personal information from job applicants who are seeking Information Technology and Management consulting positions with Malikco or our clients. We receive information from applicants related to work history, job references, education. We are required by our contracts to perform background checks on all job applicants and applicants fill out forms provided by our third party background check provider, Hireright. Standard background checks include employment history, educational degrees,criminal history, social security number validation and visa status. This information is collected at the beginning of the process as it is required before an applicant can be accepted onto a project.
contactoff1: 4784 Circle Hill Drive Valley Springs CA 95252
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: Malikco commits to cooperate with the data protection authorities located in the European union and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner or their authorized representatives
